title: Radial endobronchial ultrasound - guided bronchoscopy for the diagnosis of peripheral pulmonary lesions: A systematic review and meta-analysis of prospective trials
content:
Publication date: 30 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 8

Author(s): Sen Tian, Xiang Li, Jian Liu, Xinyu Wang, Hui Chen, Zeyu Dai, Qian Chen, Hui Shi, Yonghua Li, Haidong Huang, Chong Bai
